title: Domain 3.7: Given a scenario, install and replace printer consumables.
content:
🖨️ Laser Printers

🔧 Components

  • Imaging Drum: Transfers toner to paper (may be separate from cartridge)
  • Fuser Assembly: Heats and presses toner into paper
  • Transfer Belt/Roller: Moves paper and toner through print path
  • Pickup Rollers / Separation Pads: Feed one page at a time
  • Duplexing Assembly: Flips paper for double-sided printing

🌀 Laser Imaging Process (7 Steps)

  1. Processing
  2. Charging
  3. Exposing
  4. Developing
  5. Transferring
  6. Fusing
  7. Cleaning

🧠 Mnemonic: Please Charge Every Developer To Fix Copies

🛠️ Maintenance

  • Replace Toner
  • Apply Maintenance Kit (rollers, fuser, pads)
  • Calibrate output
  • Clean dust buildup

🖨️ Inkjet Printers

🔧 Components

  • Ink Cartridge: Black/color ink (CMYK or combo)
  • Print Head: Sprays ink (built-in or separate)
  • Roller: Feeds paper
  • Duplexing Assembly: Handles two-sided printing
  • Carriage Belt: Moves print head side to side

🎯 Calibration

  • Aligns print heads
  • Run after ink changes or if prints are misaligned

🛠️ Maintenance

  • Clean print heads
  • Replace ink cartridges
  • Clear jams
  • Calibrate when needed

♨️ Thermal Printers

🔧 Components

  • Feed Assembly: Moves paper
  • Heating Element: Applies heat to special paper
  • Thermal Paper: Heat-sensitive, shiny surface

🛠️ Maintenance

  • Replace paper
  • Clean heating element
  • Remove debris

🧠 Tip: Blank prints often mean wrong or upside-down paper.

🧾 Impact Printers

🔧 Components

  • Print Head: Pins strike ribbon to form characters
  • Ribbon: Inked strip (replace when faded)
  • Tractor Feed: Pulls multipart/form paper

🛠️ Maintenance

  • Replace ribbon
  • Replace print head
  • Replace paper

🧱 3D Printers

🧵 Filament (FDM)

  • Uses PLA, ABS
  • Melted and extruded through heated nozzle
  • Affordable, great for hobbyists

🧪 Resin (SLA)

  • Uses UV light to cure liquid resin
  • More detailed prints, but messier

🛏️ Print Bed

  • Surface where object prints
  • Must be leveled
  • Often heated to prevent warping

🛠️ Maintenance

  • Reload filament/resin
  • Clean nozzle or resin vat
  • Level bed regularly
  • Remove failed prints and debris
